name: The Box Clutch - Black
description:
The idea behind The Box was to create a structured stand-alone clutch. The wrapped leather closure gives an unexpected element of surprise and sophistication. Classic at its best. 

Large enough to carry all of the essentials: phone, money, red lipstick, business cards. 

Color: Black

Materials: 
- Outer: Leather, Leather Wrap Closure, Black Screws
- Lining: unlined

Dimensions:
Width: 6.5 in
Height: 6.25 in
Depth: 2 in

Handmade in U.S.A

*Please Note:  Freshly Given sources excess leathers from a factory that makes law enforcement accessories. Leather is a natural material and may exhibit variances in shading, color, and texture. Any such variations are natural attributes and are not considered defects.

name: The Envelope Clutch - Black
description:
(Slightly thicker leather than the natural version.)

Classic black envelope shaped clutch, to be carried by itself or within a larger handbag. Boasts a structured minimal design with thick, sturdy leather*. 

Large enough to carry all of the essentials: phone, money, red lipstick, business cards. Forms a beautiful patina the more you carry it.

Color: Black (Also available in natural)

Materials: 
- Outer: Leather , Plated Brass Stud Closure
- Lining: unlined

Dimensions:
Width: 7.5 in
Height: 5.5 in
Depth: .5 in (closed-flat) - can expand up to .75 in or more

Handmade in U.S.A

*Please Note:  Freshly Given sources excess leathers from a factory that makes law enforcement accessories. Leather is a natural material and may exhibit variances in shading, color, and texture. Any such variations are natural attributes and are not considered defects.

name: The Trapezoid Clutch - Natural
description:
The Trapezoid is a fundamental statement piece made to be a building block in your wardrobe. Cut from a single piece of leather with an embedded leather handle, the structured form proves to be functional and timeless.

Materials: 
- Outer: Leather , Solid Brass Stud Closure
- Lining: unlined

Dimensions:
Width: 7 in
Height: 7 in
Depth: 2 in (opening) - 6 in (base)

Handmade in NC, U.S.A

*Please Note:  Freshly Given sources excess leathers from a factory that makes law enforcement accessories. Leather is a natural material and may exhibit variances in shading, color, and texture. Any such variations are natural attributes and are not considered defects.

name: Leather Envelope Card Holder
description:
Not too small to carry the big bucks and change. Or for the plastic generation, debit cards are receipts.

Easy access to your credentials with a wrap on/wrap off leather strap.

*The clincher:
Handcrafted with excess furniture leather sourced locally.
Raw inside
Silver grommet
Limited quantities

Please Note: Leather is a natural material and may exhibit variances in shading, color, and texture. Any such variations are natural attributes and are not considered defects.

name: Black on Black Leather Foldover Clutch
description:
Classic at its best.
Don't date yourself, outlast every trend with this black leather* bag.
So sharp, it'll cut butter.

Complete with a soft sheen and top of the line zipper closure. I'm proud to say there are only a few.

Carry the bag as a fold-over clutch, a rolled down "paper bag", or however feels right.

*The clincher:
Handcrafted with excess furniture leather sourced locally ... (bags may contain unique markings indicative of their source).
Lined with reclaimed fabric.
RiRi Zipper - Silver
Design process takes shape of leather into consideration to minimize waste.

Limited quantities: Each bag is unique to ensure you're the special one.

Please Note: Leather is a natural material and may exhibit variances in shading, color, and texture. Any such variations are natural attributes and are not considered defects.

name: Versatile Color Block Bag
description:
When was the last time you experienced versatility in a handbag?

Color blocked with soft high quality burnt orange and rose smoke leather*, the story only begins there.

Carry the bag as a fold-over clutch, a rolled down "paper bag", over the shoulder, or cross body. My mother prefers to simply grab the mouth of the bag and go. Wear it on the orange side or flip to the rose smoke. Either way, let your creativity flow!

*The clincher:
Handcrafted with excess furniture leather sourced locally ... (bags may contain unique markings indicative of their source).
Lined with reclaimed fabric, slightly chunky and exposed.
Each bag features a removable silver chain.
Design process takes shape of leather into consideration to minimize waste.
Rare Earth Magnetic closure.

Limited quantities: Each bag is unique to ensure you're the special one.

Shipping: Made to order. Please allow 1.5-2 weeks for shipping. Longer if international.

Please Note: Leather is a natural material and may exhibit variances in shading, color, and texture. Any such variations are natural attributes and are not considered defects.

Read more about my background: http://freshlygiven.com/contact-me/

description:

(Please ask if you would like Sterling Silver non-plated)

Note: Leather is a natural material and may exhibit variances in shading, color, and texture. Any such variations are natural attributes and are not considered defects. 

Earring findings are made in the U.S.A. of solid brass and then plated in the U.S.A. with lead-free plating. Brass is a naturally lead-free alloy of copper and zinc.
